params.incentiveToken: The incentive token to claim fees for
params.to: The address to send fees claimed to

params._minimumFrontendFee: The minimum frontend fee that a market can set
params._owner: The address that will be set as the owner of the contract
params._pointsFactory: The address of a points factory contract for creating Point's campaign
params._protocolFee: The percent deducted from the IP's incentive amount and claimable by protocolFeeClaimant

params._minimumFrontendFee: The minimum frontend fee for a market, 1e18 == 100% fee

params._protocolFee: The percent deducted from the IP's incentive amount and claimable by protocolFeeClaimant, 1e18 == 100% fee

params._protocolFeeClaimant: The address allowed to claim protocol fees

POINTS_FACTORY().notice: The address of the PointsFactory contract

cancelAPOffer(bytes32).notice: Cancel an AP offer, setting the remaining quantity available to fill to 0

cancelIPOffer(bytes32).notice: Cancel an IP offer, setting the remaining quantity available to fill to 0 and returning the IP's incentives

getAPOfferHash(uint256,bytes32,address,u.notice: Calculates the hash of an AP offer

getIPOfferHash(uint256,bytes32,address,u.notice: Calculates the hash of an IP offer

getMarketHash((address,uint256,uint256,b.notice: Calculates the hash of a Weiroll Market

minimumFrontendFee().notice: Markets can opt into a higher frontend fee to incentivize quick discovery but cannot go below this minimum

numAPOffers().notice: The number of AP offers that have been created

numIPOffers().notice: The number of IP offers that have been created

numMarkets().notice: The number of unique offchain action markets created

protocolFee().notice: The percent deducted from the IP's incentive amount and claimable by protocolFeeClaimant

setMinimumFrontendFee(uint256).notice: sets the minimum frontend fee that a market can set and is paid to whoever fills the offer

setOffersPaused(bool).notice: Setter to pause and unpause fills

setProtocolFee(uint256).notice: sets the protocol fee rate, taken on all fills

setProtocolFeeClaimant(address).notice: sets the protocol fee recipient, taken on all fills
